title: The Cactus: profile of a plant
creator_credit: Encyclopaedia Britannica Films and Edward C. Harris
brief_description: Examines the structure life functions of the cactus in its natural environment by means of close-up time lapse photography. Explains the ability of the cactus to survive in the harsh desert environment.
creator_credit_for_label: Encyclopaedia Britannica Films and Edward C. Harris
